message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is considerably higher for me. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the product's value, I would like to counter with an offer of $14,000.
